alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:02AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western St. Bernard, Orleans, north central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 930 AM CDT... At 902 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jefferson to Gretna to near Estelle. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Metairie, Jefferson, Gretna, Woodmere, Terrytown, Violet, Meraux, Poydras, Estelle, Shell Beach, Arabi and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 230 and 250. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
